entry.title: Preethi-Hatui/SmartToDoList: SmartToDoList is a lightweight web application designed to help you efficiently manage your daily tasks. With features to add, edit, complete, and delete tasks, as well as a task history and dark/light theme toggle, this app provides a simple yet visually appealing solution to stay organized.
entry.content: SmartToDoList is a lightweight web application designed to help you efficiently manage your daily tasks. entry.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
entry.content: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.

entry.content: Dropzy (Drop Easy) is a peer-to-peer file-sharing app for local WiFi networks. Share files fast, securely, and offline between devices‚Äîno cloud needed. Built with Next JS. Simple, cross-platform, and lightweight. Perfect for quick, private transfers.
